alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 3:34PM CDT until April 21 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL VERNON COUNTY... At 334 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nevada, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nevada... Walker... Moundville... Milo... Deerfield... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 81 and 97. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
